verses.verse: To the chief<WH5329> Musician,<WH5329> Altaschith,<WH516> Michtam<WH4387> of David,<WH1732> when he fled<WH1272> from Saul<WH7586> in the cave.<WH4631> Be merciful<WH2603> to me, O God,<WH430> be merciful<WH2603> to me: for my soul<WH5315> trusts<WH2620> in you: yes, in the shadow<WH6738> of your wings<WH3671> will I make my refuge,<WH2620> until<WH5704> these calamities<WH1942> be over.<WH5674>
I will cry<WH7121> to God<WH430> most<WH5945> high;<WH5945> to God<WH410> that performes<WH1584> all<WH3605> things for me.

He shall send<WH7971> from heaven,<WH8064> and save<WH3467> me from the reproach<WH2778> of him that would swallow<WH7602> me up. Selah.<WH5542> God<WH430> shall send<WH7971> forth his mercy<WH2617> and his truth.<WH571>

My soul<WH5315> is among<WH8432> lions:<WH3833> and I lie<WH7901> even among them that are set on fire,<WH3857> even the sons<WH1121> of men,<WH120> whose teeth<WH8127> are spears<WH2595> and arrows,<WH2671> and their tongue<WH3956> a sharp<WH2299> sword.<WH2719>
Be you exalted,<WH7311> O God,<WH430> above<WH5921> the heavens;<WH8064> let your glory<WH3519> be above<WH5921> all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>

They have prepared<WH3559> a net<WH7568> for my steps;<WH6471> my soul<WH5315> is bowed<WH3721> down: they have dig<WH3738> a pit<WH7882> before<WH6440> me, into the middle<WH8432> whereof they are fallen<WH5307> themselves. Selah.<WH5542>
My heart<WH3820> is fixed,<WH3559> O God,<WH430> my heart<WH3820> is fixed:<WH3559> I will sing<WH7891> and give praise.<WH2167>
Awake<WH5782> up, my glory;<WH3519> awake,<WH5782> psaltery<WH5035> and harp:<WH3658> I myself will awake<WH5782> early.<WH7837>
I will praise<WH3034> you, O Lord,<WH136> among the people:<WH5971> I will sing<WH2167> to you among the nations.<WH3816>
For your mercy<WH2617> is great<WH1419> to the heavens,<WH8064> and your truth<WH571> to the clouds.<WH7834>
Be you exalted,<WH7311> O God,<WH430> above<WH5921> the heavens:<WH8064> let your glory<WH3519> be above<WH5921> all<WH3605> the earth.<WH776>
